body_html: If you're willing to go over all libs anyway, then it would be better to convert them to use stdint types (e.g. int64_t for long), so that you don't need to use any macros, and it would be truly cross-platform. We wanted to make that change a while ago, but it turned out to be a lot of work, and we decided to postpone it after the release.

body: If you're willing to go over all libs anyway, then it would be better to convert them to use stdint types (e.g. `int64_t` for long), so that you don't need to use any macros, and it would be truly cross-platform. We wanted to make that change a while ago, but it turned out to be a lot of work, and we decided to postpone it after the release.
